54.eng-name: The Book of Tribulations and Portents of the Last Hour

hadiths.text: Telah menceritakan kepada kami [Qutaibah bin Sa'id] telah menceritakan kepada kami [Abdulaziz Ad Darawardi] dari [Tsaur bin Zaid] dari [Abu Al Ghaits] dari [Abu Hurairah] Rasulullah Shallallahu 'alaihi wa Salam bersabda: "Dzus Suwaiqatain dari Habasyah meruntuhkan rumah Allah 'azza wajalla

chapter.ara-name: بَاب لَا تَقُومُ السَّاعَةُ حَتَّى يَمُرَّ الرَّجُلُ بِقَبْرِ الرَّجُلِ فَيَتَمَنَّى أَنْ يَكُونَ مَكَانَ الْمَيِّتِ مِنْ الْبَلَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: The Hour Will Not Begin Until A Man Passes By Another Man's Grave And Wishes That He Was In The Place Of The Deceased, Because Of Calamity
